settings.title: ALL ABOUT YOUR ORDER
settings.content:
We're happy when you're happy! Should you have any problems with your order or a product you have received, do not hesitate to contact us right away so that we may remedy the situation.

If you are not finding the information you are looking for here, please feel free to contact us with any inquiries.  Please allow up to 3 business days for a response at this time.

settings.title: produced and packaged with care
settings.content: We dedicate much care and attention to each and every order. Because our teas and items are hand-packaged to order, you can be assured that you are receiving the most fresh, flavorful and quality teas and products. Please refer to the following processing times & info for your order.

settings.title: How long will the order take to process?
settings.answer:
Due to the handcrafted quality of our product, please note that it can take up to 7-10 business days to process your order before shipment. 

We strive to produce and process orders much faster, yet, this also allows for a healthy buffer for the unexpected and/or busier times of the year.

During the winter holiday season + new year (November 1 - January 1), in the weeks before Valentine’s Day and mother’s day, and during the release of new or special products/releases - orders can take up to 10 business days for processing prior to shipping.

settings.title: How long will the order take to ship after processing?
settings.answer:
Shipments originate from Taos, NM. Transit times may vary depending on where the packages are being delivered. 

Typically shipping times can take up to 3-5 business days.  

However, we buffer in up to 7 business days to buffer for the unexpected and/or busier times of the year.

settings.title: When is it best to place my order?
settings.answer: Please keep in mind that orders placed after 12 pm MST on Friday may not process or ship until the following week as tea.o.graphy’s production studio is not operational during the weekend. Order before then to receive your order sooner!

settings.title: How do I know my order is received?
settings.answer: Once your order has been placed, you should receive an automatically generated email with an order confirmation.

settings.title: Will I receive a tracking code?
settings.answer: Once your order has been fully processed and has been prepared to ship (possibly 7-10 business days from order date), you will receive an automatically generated email with your shipment details and tracking number.

settings.title: Need extra shipping insurance?
settings.answer:
Tea.o.graphy cannot be held responsible for loss or damage of items while in transit. When your item ships, you will receive a confirmation and tracking number.

Please contact us if you would like to purchase insurance for your package, we would be happy to do so! Insurance up to $50 is automatically included in USPS Priority Mail shipments.

settings.title: Shipping outside the USA?
settings.answer:
If you are ordering from outside of the US, you may contact us with your order details and we will be happy to prepare a custom shipping quote.

For international orders, please be mindful of your own country's customs regulations, as tea.o.graphy cannot be held responsible for any taxes, fees, loss or damage resulting from your package's processing through that system. We are not able to mark international items as "gifts", as this is illegal. Thank you for your understanding!

settings.title: Can I get a refund for my order?
settings.answer:
We're happy when you're happy!

Should you have any problems with your order or a product you have received, do not hesitate to contact us right away so that we may remedy the situation.

settings.title: Are wholesale and bulk orders refundable?
settings.answer: Please note that custom, wholesale, and orders over $500 are nonrefundable but may be eligible for a credit.

settings.title: What currencies or payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: All prices are in US dollars, and we securely accept all major credit cards via PayPal or Stripe.
